[**HostHaat.com**](HostHaat.com) Is Pleased To Announce Its Latest VPS Promotion Offer First On LowEndTalk.
HostHaat Is A Leading Provider Of Onshore And Offshore Web hosting, Reseller hosting, Master Reseller Hosting , Alpha Reseller Hosting , Remote Desktop, VPS hosting and Dedicated Servers Hosting .

**Virtual Server Features:**
> • Instant vBOX Setup
• OpenVZ Virtualization
• SolusVM management panel for reboot, shutdown, boot, reinstall etc. 
• Editable rDNS
• Custom Hostname
• 7200 RPM RAID Hard Drives
• Intel® Xeon E3-1240, 4x2x3.3 GHz
• Full Root Access
• 1Gbps Port
• 99.97% Uptime
• OS Templates - CentOS, Debian, Suse, Ubuntu, Fedora, CentOS w/Kloxo W/cPanel.

**vBOX Plan #2**
> - Disk Space: 20GB
- Bandwidth: 100GB
- Guaranteed RAM: 256MB
- Burstable RAM: 512MB
- CPU Core: 1
- Location: Luxembourg
- Coupon Code: hosthaat20
- Monthly: 5.56$ [ With 20% Recurring Discount]
